description: They walked that man right out of the church after that massacre, gave him a vest, and fed him as if he succeeded in a mission or something. George Floyd was SUSPECTED of forgery and look what happened. America’s justice system been due for reform a long time ago because these animals with absolutely no training whatsoever are afraid. Never give a scared man a firearm and most of these cops became cops because they grew up scared and now have a badge and gun to give them courage. Then they’re giving these scared little boys guns with no training. In the military we’re trained to KILL, as police officers, you’re trained to PROTECT and the entire country are AFRAID of police officers because they’re forgetting they are here to PROTECT, not INTIMIDATE, that’s sad. It’s 2020 and you’re THAT afraid of a man that you have to KILL him? That shit is crazy. #GeorgeFloyd #Reform #PoliceThePolice #PoliceBrutality #Murder #Afraid #Police #Cops #PoliceAcademy #Rookie #Fear #Scary #Black #Racism #JusticeSystem #CriminalJustice #Crime #Justice #America #WildWest #Guns #Firearms #PoliceOfficers #NoTraining #Training #NewWorldOrder #Genocide #PopulationControl #Illuminati
